abstract: NHL Roundup; Washington Capitals defeat Pittsburgh Penguins, 4-1; other ice hockey scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: T.J. Oshie scored twice to lead the Capitals to a 4-1 victory on Monday in Pittsburgh.

headline.main: Capitals Ruin Debut of Penguins’ Coach; Oilers Win 6th Straight
headline.print_headline: Capitals Ruin Debut of Penguins’ Coach; Oilers Win 6th Straight

snippet: T.J. Oshie scored twice to lead the Capitals to a 4-1 victory on Monday in Pittsburgh.
